ns2:test-suite.name: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application and search for flights
test-case.title: Login into the application and search for flights

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.makemytrip.com"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.makemytrip.com"

step.name: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page for MakeMyTrip
step.title: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page for MakeMyTrip

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page of MakeMyTrip
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page of MakeMyTrip

step.name: When I enter username of MakemMyTrip as "testusername"
step.title: When I enter username of MakemMyTrip as "testusername"

step.name: And I Click on Continue button under loginpage of MakeMyTrip
step.title: And I Click on Continue button under loginpage of MakeMyTrip

step.name: And I enter password of MakeMyTrip as "testpassword"
step.title: And I enter password of MakeMyTrip as "testpassword"

step.name: And click on login button of MakeMyTrip
step.title: And click on login button of MakeMyTrip

step.name: Then I am logged in on MakeMytrip
step.title: Then I am logged in on MakeMytrip

step.name: Then I click on Flight link and select Round Trip
step.title: Then I click on Flight link and select Round Trip

step.name: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"
step.title: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"

step.name: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"
step.title: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application and search for flights

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials
